content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment for your living needs. How much are you willing to pay for a monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Interesting. 500 euros is a good starting point. Is there anything else you would like to consider regarding the price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I am willing to pay 500 euros. I am a responsible and dependable person. I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent. I appreciate your commitment to maintaining the apartment. Would you be willing to increase the offer slightly? I'm sure you understand that I'm looking for the best deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Let's say 510 euros. I am a student so I would prefer the lowest price possible. I also follow moral and ethical standards. Therefore, I want to be honest and fair.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia. Your honesty is commendable. How about we meet in the middle? 550 euros would be a fair compromise, don't you think? It's a reasonable increase from your initial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 530 euros. I am smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, Mister Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Very well, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 530 euros is a fair price. I agree to this offer. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
